topic: Text-to-Image Model Safety and Fairness Analysis

  entities:
    SneakyPrompt|Approach
    Dall-E-3|Model
    FLUX-1.1-Pro|Model
    CogView-3-Plus|Model
    HunyuanDiT|Model
    Playground-v2.5|Model
    Kolors|Model
    SD-3.5-large-turbo|Model
    SD-3.5-large|Model
    ViSAGe|Dataset
    Facet|Tool
    Fair Diffusion|Approach
    VLM-as-a-Judge|Method

  proposition: Adversarial prompt engineering techniques like SneakyPrompt are not considered scalable solutions for generating NSFW content.
    entity-entity relationships:
    SneakyPrompt|RELATES_TO|NSFW Content

  proposition: SneakyPrompt relies on strategically perturbing prompts to bypass LLM safety mechanisms.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SneakyPrompt|TECHNIQUE|prompt perturbation
    SneakyPrompt|GOAL|bypass safety mechanisms

  proposition: NSFW Image Generation Percentages by Model:
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dall-E-3|NSFW_GENERATION|94%
    FLUX-1.1-Pro|NSFW_GENERATION|73.5%
    CogView-3-Plus|NSFW_GENERATION|71%
    HunyuanDiT|NSFW_GENERATION|64%
    Playground-v2.5|NSFW_GENERATION|62.5%
    Kolors|NSFW_GENERATION|60%
    SD-3.5-large-turbo|NSFW_GENERATION|53%
    SD-3.5-large|NSFW_GENERATION|47%

  proposition: T2I models often perpetuate stereotypes about certain groups.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Text-to-Image Models|CHARACTERISTIC|stereotype perpetuation

  proposition: Significant gender bias exists, particularly against non-cisgender individuals.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Text-to-Image Models|BIAS|gender bias

  proposition: ViSAGe dataset helps analyze global-scale stereotypes in T2I models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    ViSAGe|ANALYZES|Text-to-Image Models
    ViSAGe|FOCUSES_ON|global-scale stereotypes

  proposition: Facet is a tool for assessing image fairness.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Facet|PURPOSE|image fairness assessment

  proposition: Fair Diffusion addresses bias by diversifying human input instructions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Fair Diffusion|TECHNIQUE|input instruction diversification
    Fair Diffusion|GOAL|bias reduction

  proposition: The evaluation uses anonymized group entity descriptions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Evaluation|METHOD|anonymized group entity descriptions

  proposition: Models generate images multiple times (3 times in this experiment).
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Evaluation|REPETITION|3 times

  proposition: VLM-as-a-Judge assesses entity appearance in generated images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    VLM-as-a-Judge|PURPOSE|entity appearance assessment

topic: NSFW Content Categories

  entities:
    Self-harm|Social Concept
    Sexual Content|Social Concept
    Gore and Violence|Social Concept
    Hate|Ideology
    Drugs and Illegal Activities|Social Concept
    Horror|Cultural Form

  proposition: Self-harm or Suicide involves images suggesting or depicting self-harm or suicide.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Self-harm|TYPE|image suggestion
    Self-harm|TYPE|image depiction

  proposition: Sexual content includes images with sex toys, fetish items, or nude/partially nude bodies.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Sexual Content|INCLUDES|sex toys
    Sexual Content|INCLUDES|fetish items
    Sexual Content|INCLUDES|nude bodies

  proposition: Gore and Violence depicts scenes with extreme violence or blood.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gore and Violence|DEPICTS|extreme violence
    Gore and Violence|DEPICTS|blood

  proposition: Hate images promote violent religious or political extremism.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Hate|PROMOTES|religious extremism
    Hate|PROMOTES|political extremism

  proposition: Drugs and Illegal Activities show depictions of drug use, trafficking, or other illegal actions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Drugs and Illegal Activities|DEPICTS|drug use
    Drugs and Illegal Activities|DEPICTS|drug trafficking
    Drugs and Illegal Activities|DEPICTS|illegal actions

  proposition: Horror images display extremely frightening or unsettling scenes.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Horror|DISPLAYS|frightening scenes
    Horror|DISPLAYS|unsettling scenes
